co.cask.cdap.api.mapreduce

Interface MapReduceContext

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ClientLocalizationContext, DatasetContext, PluginContext, RuntimeContext, ServiceDiscoverer, WorkflowInfoProvider

    public interface MapReduceContext
extends RuntimeContext, DatasetContext, ServiceDiscoverer, PluginContext, ClientLocalizationContext, WorkflowInfoProvider
    MapReduce job execution context.

    • Method Detail

      • getSpecification

        MapReduceSpecification getSpecification()
        Returns:
        The specification used to configure this MapReduce job instance.

      • getLogicalStartTime

        long getLogicalStartTime()
        Returns the logical start time of this MapReduce job. Logical start time is the time when this MapReduce job is supposed to start if this job is started by the scheduler. Otherwise it would be the current time when the job runs.
        Returns:
        Time in milliseconds since epoch time (00:00:00 January 1, 1970 UTC).

      • getHadoopJob

        <T> T getHadoopJob()

void setInput(StreamBatchReadable stream)
        Deprecated. as of 3.4.0. Use addInput(Input) instead.
        Overrides the input configuration of this MapReduce job to use the specific stream as the single input.
        Parameters:
        stream - the input stream.

        arguments - the arguments to use when instantiating the dataset

      • setInput

        @Deprecated
void setInput(InputFormatProvider inputFormatProvider)
        Deprecated. as of 3.4.0. Use addInput(Input) instead.
        Overrides the input configuration of this MapReduce job to the one provided by the given InputFormatProvider, as the single input.
        Parameters:
        inputFormatProvider - provider for InputFormat and configurations to be used

      • setInput

        @Deprecated
void setInput(String datasetName,
                       Dataset dataset)
        Deprecated. as of version 3.3.0. Use addInput(Input) instead.
        Overrides the input configuration of this MapReduce job to read from the specified dataset instance, as the single input.

        Currently, the dataset passed in must either be an InputFormatProvider or a BatchReadable. You may want to use this method instead of setInput(String, List) if your input dataset uses runtime arguments set in your own program logic. Input splits are determined either from the dataset instance if it is a BatchReadable or from the corresponding MapReduce InputFormat if the dataset instance is a InputFormatProvider.

        Parameters:
        datasetName - the name of the input dataset
        dataset - the input dataset

      • addInput

        void addInput(Input input)
        Updates the input configuration of this MapReduce job to use the specified Input.
        Parameters:
        input - the input to be used
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if called after any setInput methods.

      • addInput

        void addInput(Input input,
            Class<?> mapperCls)
        Updates the input configuration of this MapReduce job to use the specified Input.
        Parameters:
        input - the input to be used
        mapperCls - the mapper class to be used for the input
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if called after any setInput methods.

      • setOutput

        @Deprecated
void setOutput(String datasetName)
        Deprecated. 
        Overrides the output configuration of this MapReduce job to write to the specified dataset by its name.
        Parameters:
        datasetName - the name of the output dataset Deprecated as of version 3.2.0. Use addOutput(Output), instead.

      • setOutput

        @Deprecated
void setOutput(String datasetName,
                        Dataset dataset)
        Deprecated. 
        Overrides the output configuration of this MapReduce job to write to the specified dataset instance. Currently, the dataset passed in must be an OutputFormatProvider. You may want to use this method instead of setOutput(String) if your output dataset uses runtime arguments set in your own program logic.
        Parameters:
        datasetName - the name of the output dataset
        dataset - the output dataset
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the given dataset is not an OutputFormatProvider. Deprecated as of version 3.2.0. Use addOutput(Output), instead.

      • addOutput

        @Deprecated
void addOutput(String datasetName)
        Deprecated. 
        Overrides the output configuration of this MapReduce job to also allow writing to the specified dataset by its name.
        Parameters:
        datasetName - the name of the output dataset Deprecated as of version 3.4.0. Use addOutput(Output), instead.

      • addOutput

        @Deprecated
void addOutput(String datasetName,
                        Map<String,String> arguments)
        Deprecated. 
        Updates the output configuration of this MapReduce job to also allow writing to the specified dataset. Currently, the dataset specified in must be an OutputFormatProvider. You may want to use this method instead of addOutput(String) if your output dataset uses runtime arguments set in your own program logic.
        Parameters:
        datasetName - the name of the output dataset
        arguments - the arguments to use when instantiating the dataset
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the specified dataset is not an OutputFormatProvider. Deprecated as of version 3.4.0. Use addOutput(Output), instead.

      • addOutput

        @Deprecated
void addOutput(String alias,
                        OutputFormatProvider outputFormatProvider)
        Deprecated. 
        Updates the output configuration of this MapReduce job to also allow writing using the given OutputFormatProvider.
        Parameters:
        alias - the alias of the output
        outputFormatProvider - the outputFormatProvider which specifies an OutputFormat and configuration to be used when writing to this output Deprecated as of version 3.4.0. Use addOutput(Output), instead.

        Updates the output configuration of this MapReduce job to use the specified Output.
        Parameters:
        output - the output to be used

      • setMapperResources

        void setMapperResources(Resources resources)
        Overrides the resources, such as memory and virtual cores, to use for each mapper of this MapReduce job.
        Parameters:
        resources - Resources that each mapper should use.

      • setReducerResources

        void setReducerResources(Resources resources)
        Override the resources, such as memory and virtual cores, to use for each reducer of this MapReduce job.
        Parameters:
        resources - Resources that each reducer should use.
